effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user tramples its target into the ground, dealing damage. This also lowers the target’s action speed.
